title: Canada Protests Live Updates: Trudeau Declares National Emergency
content:
1. Canada Protests Live Updates: Trudeau Declares National Emergency  The New York Times
  2. LIVE: Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau delivers remarks  Reuters

  4. Canada's Trudeau invokes emergency powers to quell protests  Associated Press
  5. Trudeau invokes Emergencies Act against 'Freedom Convoy' trucker protest  The Washington Post
